7.05am LOOP service

Print increase text size reset text size decrease text size
 

City Loop - QUT, Botanic Gdns, Eagle St, Central, George St

This trip services stops in zone 1

All stops and times for the 7.05am LOOP service
Time Stop description
7.05am Parliament Stop 94A Margaret St
7.05am Parliament Stop 94A Margaret St
7.06am Margaret Street Stop 97 near Albert St
7.07am Margaret Street Stop 98 near Edward St
7.09am Eagle Street Stop 155 near Charlotte St
7.10am Eagle St app Queen St (Stop 65)
7.13am Wharf Street Stop 156 near Ann St
7.15am Ann Street Stop 8
7.18am Ann Street Stop 11 at City Hall
7.18am William Street Stop 105 near Elizabeth St
7.21am William Street Stop 103 at Commissariat/Casino
